description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Settings***.
2. Click ***Edit appointment reminders***.
3. Select the desired appointment booking calendar.
4. Click on ***Edit appointment reminder*** to edit the appointment reminder that already exists.
5. Click on the red minus symbol to delete the respective existing appointment reminder.
6. Click on the green plus symbol to insert a new appointment reminder.
7. Click ***Add preferences*** to open and add already preset appointment reminders. These can also be customized afterwards.
8. The following settings can be made: Send by SMS or by email, send X days or X hours before appointment, turn appointment reminder on or off.
9. Click on ***edit*** to edit the text of the appointment reminder. This is only possible for appointment reminders via email. Appointment reminders via SMS always have the same default text.
10. Click on ***Save appointment reminder now***.
11. Click on ***delete*** if you want to delete an appointment reminder.
title: SMS appointment reminders
